languages.text:
Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Executioner gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to their parameters for each creature (enemy or ally) in combat suffering from the following damage-over-time effects:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} per creature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} per creature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} per creature up to a maximum of <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus</u>.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Until the start of the next turn, Executioner gets a bonus to his stats for each character (enemy or ally) in combat with this type of DoT effect:
- Bleeding: {uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% armour per character
- Burning: {uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% dodge per character
- Toxin: 1 Deflection per character (up to TB)

Until the start of their next turn, the Executioner gets bonuses to their parameters per each creature (enemy or ally) in combat under the following damage-over-time effects:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} per creature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} per creature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: +1 deflection per creature up a maximum of <u>TGH bonus</u>.</indent>

languages.text:
Hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el ejecutor gana {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} a sus parámetros por cada criatura en combate (enemiga o aliada) que sufra los siguientes efectos de daño continuado:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Hemorragia{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} por criatura</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Quemadura{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} por criatura</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxina{/g}: +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por criatura hasta un máximo de <u>bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u>.</indent>

languages.text:
自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、エクスキューショナーは、戦闘中に以下の継続ダメージを受けている生物（敵または味方）1体につき、そのパラメーターに{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}：生物1体につき{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}%増加</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}：生物1体につき{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}%増加</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}：生物1体につき{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}+1付与（最大<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}ボーナス</u>）</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} per creature up to a maximum of <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus</u>.</indent>

languages.text:
直到行刑者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，战斗中每有一名生物（不分敌我）受持续伤害效果影响，行刑者就会获得额外属性{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}：每个生物提供+{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}：每个生物提供+{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}：每个生物提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，最高等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}加值</u>。</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} per creature up to a maximum of <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus</u>.</indent>

languages.text:
Bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält der Henker {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf seine Parameter für jede (verbündete oder feindliche) Kreatur im Kampf, die mit einem der folgenden Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte belegt ist:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} pro Kreatur</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} pro Kreatur</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}: +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} pro Kreatur bis zu einem maximalen <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-Bonus</u>.</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} per creature</indent>

languages.text:
Jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'exécuteur bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} à ses paramètres pour chaque créature (ennemie ou alliée) en combat subissant les effets de dégâts progressifs :
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} : +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} par créature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} : +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} par créature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} : +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} par créature (bonus d'<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g} maximum</u>).</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} per creature</indent>

languages.text:
До начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} палач получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} за противников и союзников в бою, на которых действуют эффекты периодического урона:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Кровотечение{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} за каждое существо</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Горение{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} за каждое существо</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Отравление{/g}: +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждое существо (вплоть до максимума, равного <u>бонусу {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u>).</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} per creature</indent>

До начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} палач получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} за противников и союзников в бою, на которых действуют эффекты периодического урона:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Кровотечение{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} за каждое существо</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Горение{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} за каждое существо</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Отравление{/g}: +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждое существо (вплоть до максимума, равного <u>бонусу {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u>).</indent>

languages.text:
Cellat, çatışmada zamanla hasar veren şu etkilerden muzdarip olan her yaratık (düşman veya dost birim) için parametrelerine, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başlangıcına dek kalan {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} kazanır:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kanama{/g}: Yaratık başına +%{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanma{/g}: Yaratık başına +%{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksin{/g}: Yaratık başına +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}. Bu değer en fazla <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} bonusu</u> kadar olabilir.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Executioner gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to their parameters for each creature (enemy or ally) in combat suffering from the following damage-over-time effects:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} per creature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: +{uip|Resist|dfd41fb2d75445919683b1ea0c4cc40d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} per creature</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} per creature up to a maximum of <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus</u>.</indent>
